occurrences.sample: you know that the testing of your faith produces endurance
Blessed is the person who endures testing
No one who is being tempted should say, 'I am being tempted by God'
But each one is tempted when he is dragged away and enticed by his own desires
because you know that the testing of your faith produces endurance
Now if any of you lacks wisdom, let him ask for it from God
Understand this, my dear brothers: every person must be quick to hear
the testing of your faith produces endurance
And let endurance have its perfect effect
Blessed is the person who endures testing
the testing of your faith produces endurance
But let him ask for it in faith, without any doubting
for the one who doubts is like the surf of the sea, driven by the wind and tossed about
And let endurance have its perfect effect, so that you may be mature and complete
Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above
But the one who looks into the perfect law of liberty and continues to do it
